thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 27 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Serviceware Q1 Consolidated Earnings Up 6.2 Percent At EUR 1.4 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Serviceware Q1 Consolidated Earnings Up 6.2 Percent At EUR 1.4 Million
text:
April 27 (Reuters) - Serviceware SE:
* DGAP-NEWS: SERVICEWARE SE LIFTS REVENUES AND EARNINGS IN Q1 2017/2018 - EBIT MARGIN OF AROUND 14 PERCENT
* Q1 CONSOLIDATED REVENUES LIFTED BY 11 PERCENT TO EUR 12.8 MILLION
* EBIT IN Q1 TOTALED EUR 1.8 MILLION, UP BY 5 PERCENT COMPARED TO SAME PERIOD OF PREVIOUS YEAR
* Q1 CONSOLIDATED EARNINGS INCREASED BY 6.2 PERCENT TO EUR 1.4 MILLION
* OUR GROWTH IN Q2 TO DATE ALSO MEANS THAT WE ARE VERY CONFIDENT FOR CURRENT FISCAL YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
